definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Rihanna's face always pops no matter how many layers of hair she's got.
sentences.chinese: 不管她的頭髮剪成幾層，蕾哈娜的臉總是很大很突。

sentences.english: The cutter first cuts the outline of the pattern, then sews it onto another piece of paper.
sentences.chinese: 每剪成一個圖形，把它用線粗粗地縫在另一張紙上。

sentences.english: I'm not satisfied with the way he cut my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我不滿意他把我頭髮剪成那樣。

sentences.english: To simplify harvesting, the trees are pruned to 8 to 10 feet.
sentences.chinese: 爲了收穫簡單，一般將樹剪成8到10英尺高。

sentences.english: Once the fabric has completely dried, trim the edges and cut into your desired shape.
sentences.chinese: 等布片乾透後，修剪布邊，剪成你想要的形狀。

sentences.english: Drain in a colander and, using kitchen scissors, cut into 6-inch lengths.
sentences.chinese: 用簸篩濾水後，用廚用剪子剪成6英寸長。

sentences.english: If you’ve got a credit card, cut it in half today.
sentences.chinese: 如果你已經有一張信用卡，今天就把它剪成兩半。

sentences.english: Both characters will be cut in half hi, put the basin point of it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 兩人將喜字剪成兩半，放盆子裏點火燒了。

sentences.english: The girls began to bob their hair to be in style.
sentences.chinese: 姑娘們開始把她們的頭髮剪成時髦的短髮。

sentences.english: If you've got a credit card, cut it in half today.
sentences.chinese: 如果你已經有一張信用卡，今天就把它剪成兩半。

sentences.english: Thinly peel the carrot and cut the pickled chilli into small pieces. Rinse and slice cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 將洗淨的胡蘿蔔刨成薄片，泡椒剪成小段。

sentences.english: You don't tear newspaper into pieces to read them.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人把報紙剪成紙片再看。

sentences.english: Take a straight razor or the clippers without a gauge and trim the hairline in a straight line.
sentences.chinese: 用直刀和不帶齒的見到把髮際線剪成直線。

sentences.english: Cut up drawing into strips and plastify them with contact paper to make bookmarks.
sentences.chinese: 把畫剪成條狀然後把連在一起的兩張粘合壓縮成書籤。

sentences.english: Dye and cut your hair to the same style as your roommate.
sentences.chinese: 把你的頭髮剪成並染成和你室友一樣的樣子。

sentences.english: She squared the silk cloth off for a scarf.
sentences.chinese: 她把這塊絲料剪成方形做圍巾。

definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to cut off/to cut away/to trim
to cut up (into pieces)/to slice/to carve/to dice/to shred
to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
to put sth together from component parts
to tear out (and throw away)/to rip away
to scrape off/to shave off (whiskers etc)/(of the wind) to blow sth away
